xxl.core.io.raw

Interface RawAccess

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DecoratorRawAccess, LoggerRawAccess, NativeRawAccess, PartitionRawAccess, RAFRawAccess, RAMRawAccess, SeekMapperRawAccess, StatisticsRawAccess, TesterRawAccess

    public interface RawAccess
    Interface for raw file that contains sectors. This interface is implemented in NativeRawAccess, -RAF, and -RAM.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes a device/file.
      long getNumSectors()
      Returns the amount of sectors in the file/device.
      int getSectorSize()
      Returns the size of a sector of the file/device.
      void open(String filename)
      Opens a device/file.
      void read(byte[] block, long sector)
      Reads a sector of characteristic Bytes length from the file/device.
      void write(byte[] block, long sector)
      Writes a sector of a characteristic length to the file/device.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        void open(String filename)
   throws RawAccessException
        Opens a device/file.
        Parameters:
        filename - name of file or device
        Throws:
        RawAccessException - a specialized RuntimeException

      • close

        void close()
    throws RawAccessException
        Closes a device/file.
        Throws:
        RawAccessException - a specialized RuntimeException

      • write

        void write(byte[] block,
           long sector)
    throws RawAccessException
        Writes a sector of a characteristic length to the file/device.
        Parameters:
        block - byte array which will be written to the sector
        sector - number of the sector in the file/device where the block will be written
        Throws:
        RawAccessException - a specialized RuntimeException

      • read

        void read(byte[] block,
          long sector)
   throws RawAccessException
        Reads a sector of characteristic Bytes length from the file/device.
        Parameters:
        block - byte array of which will be written to the sector
        sector - number of the sector in the file/device from where the block will be read
        Throws:
        RawAccessException - a specialized RuntimeException

      • getNumSectors

        long getNumSectors()
        Returns the amount of sectors in the file/device.
        Returns:
        amount of sectors

      • getSectorSize

        int getSectorSize()
        Returns the size of a sector of the file/device.
        Returns:
        size of sectors
